metadata.name: The Sinner's Herald #1/1
metadata.description:
The ashamed sinner covers his face trying to hide from his own judgment. The light that hovers over everything and everyone touches his clothes and skin like a light breeze. Not to judge, but to forgive his actions. Because the sinner's heart is repentant, body and soul, and what was done long ago will never happen again.

Media Dimension: 3400px x 3116px
